data.title: Sikh Gurpurab Calendar 2024-25 | Nanakshahi Samat 556
data.text:
Gurpurab | Gurgaddi | Joti Jot Dates

Guru Birth GuruShip Merging/Martyrdom Guru Nanak Dev Ji 15 Nov (30 Katak) -

27 Nov (12 Assu)

Guru Angad Dev Ji 09 May (27 Vaisakh) 22 Sep (07 Assu)

12 April (30 Chet)

Guru Amar Das Sahib Ji 22 May (09 Jeth) 09 April (27 Chet)

18 Sep (03 Assu) [450th]

Guru Ram Das Sahib Ji 19 Oct (03 Katak) 16 Sept (01 Assu)

06 Sep (22 Bhaadon)

Guru Arjan Dev Ji 30 April (18 Vaisaakh) 05 Sep (21 Bhaadon)

10 June (28 Jeth)

Guru Hargobind Sahib Ji 22 June (09 Haarh) 31 May (18 Jeth)

13 April (01 Vaisaakh)

Guru Har Rai Sahib Ji 10 Feb (28 Maagh) 07 April (25 Chet)

25 Oct (09 Katak)

Guru HarKrishan Sahib Ji 29 July (14 Saavan) 25 Oct (09 Katak)

22 April (10 Vaisaakh)

Guru Tegh Bahadur Sahib Ji 29 April (17 Vaisaakh) 22 April (10 Vaisaakh)

06 Dec (21 Maghar)

Guru Gobind Singh Sahib Ji 06 Jan (23 Poh) 04 Dec (19 Maghar)

06 Nov (21 Katak)

Guru Khalsa Panth Sahib Ji 12 April (01 Vaisaakh) 22 Dec (08 Poh)

~~Living~~

Sri Guru Granth Sahib Ji 29 Aug (14 Bhaadon) 03 Nov (18 Katak) ~~Living~~

Month wise dates for Gurpurabs and historic events

March 2024 (Phagun 18th - Chet 18th)

Chet starts on 14th March

Masya (new moon) - 24th Feb.

Puranmaasi (full moon) - 25th March

March 14 Festival New Year (Bikrami Year 2081-82) Nanakshahi Samvat 556 starts 01 Chet March 14 Shaheedi Jathedar Akali Phula Singh (200th anniversary) 01 Chet March 15 Historical Sardar Baghel Singh conquering of Delhi

02 Chet

March 23 Shaheedi Bhagat Singh 10 Chet March 25 Shaheedi

Bhai Subheg Singh & Bhai Shabaz Singh

12 Chet

March 26 Celebration

Holla Mohalla

13 Chet

April 2024 (Chet 19th - Vaisaakh 18th)

Vaisaakh starts on 13thApril

Masya (new moon) - 8th April

Puranmaasi (full moon) - 23rd April

April 07 Gurgaddi Guru Har Rai Sahib Ji 25 Chet April 09 Gurgaddi Guru Amar Das Sahib Ji 27 Chet April 09 Birth Sahibzada Baba Jujhar Singh Ji 27 Chet April 12 Joti Jot Guru Angad Dev Ji 30 Chet April 13 Joti Jot Guru Hargobind Sahib Ji 01 Vaisaakh April 13 Celebration Khalsa Saajna Divas (Creation of Khalsa) 01 Vaisaakh April 13 Celebration Sikh Dastaar Divas (Sikh Turban Day) 01 Vaisaakh April 20 Birth Bhagat Dhanna Ji 08 Vaisaakh April 22 GurGaddi Guru Tegh Bahadur Sahib Ji 10 Vaisaakh April 22 Joti Jot Guru HarKrishan Sahib Ji 10 Vaisaakh April 29 Prakash Guru Tegh Bahadur Sahib Ji 17 Vaisaakh April 30 Prakash

Guru Arjan Dev Ji

18 Vaisaakh

May 2024 (Vaisaakh 19th - Jeth 18th)

Jeth starts on 14th May

Masya (new moon) - 8th May

Puranmaasi (full moon) - 23rd May

May 03 Shaheedi Sri Muktsar Sahib ~ Jorh Mela 21 Vaisaakh May 05 Birth Jassa Singh Ramgarhia 23 Vaisaakh May 09 Prakash Guru Angad Dev Ji 27 Vaisaakh May 11 Historical Victory at Sirhind (Banda Bahadur & Baba Deep Singh) 30 Vaisaakh May 16 Historical Chhota GhaluGhara (Gurdaspur) 03 Jeth May 18 Birth Jassa Singh Ahluwalia 05 Jeth May 22 Prakash Guru Amar Das Sahib Ji 09 Jeth May 31 GurGaddi Guru Hargobind Sahib Ji 18 Jeth

June 2024 (Jeth 19th - Haarh 17th)

Haarh starts on 14th Jun.

Masya (new moon) - 6th Jun.

Puranmaasi (full moon) - 22nd Jun.

June 04 Shaheedi Akal Takht Martyrdom (1984) 22 Jeth June 10 Shaheedi Guru Arjan Dev Ji 28 Jeth June 22 Prakash Sri Guru Hargobind Sahib Ji 09 Haarh June 22 Birth Bhagat Kabir Ji

09 Haarh

June 22 Celebration Jorh Mela Gurdwara Reetha Sahib 09 Haarh June 24 Shaheedi Banda Singh Bahadur 11 Haarh June 26 Historical Founding of Akal Takht (Sirjana Divas) 13 Haarh

July 2024 (Haarh 18th - Saavan 16th)

Saavan starts 16th Jul.

Masya (new moon) - 5th Jul.

Puranmaasi (full moon) - 21st Jul.

July 08 Shaheedi

Bhai Mani Singh Ji

25 Haarh

July 16 Celebration Miri Piri Divas 01 Saavan July 16 Shaheedi Bhai Taru Singh Ji 01 Saavan July 29 Prakash Guru HarKrishan Sahib Ji 14 Saavan July 31 Shaheedi Sardar Udham Singh 16 Saavan

August 2024 (Saavan 17th - Bhaadon 16th)

Bhaadon starts 17th Aug.

Masya (new moon) - 4th Aug.

Puranmaasi (full moon) - 19thAug.

August 19 Historical Jorh-Mela Baba Bakala 04 Bhaadon August 29 Historical Sampuranta Divas Sri Guru Granth Sahib Ji (at Sri Harmandir Sahib Ji) 14 Bhaadon

September 2024 (Bhaadon 17th - Assu 15th)

Assu starts 16th Sep.

Masya - 2-3th Sep.

Puranmaasi - 18th Sep.

September 04 Prakash 1st Prakash Sri Guru Granth Sahib Ji 20 Bhaadon September 05 GurGaddi Guru Arjan Dev Ji

21 Bhaadon

September 06 Joti Jot Guru Ram Das Sahib Ji 22 Bhaadon September 10 Celebration Jorh Mela Gurdwara Kandh Sahib/Dehra Sahib 26 Bhaadon September 10 Historical Marriage of Guru Nanak Dev Ji/Mata Sulakhni Ji 26 Bhaadon September 16 Gurgaddi Guru Ram Das Ji 01 Assu September 18 Joti Jot Guru Amar Das Ji (450th Commemoration) 03 Assu September 21 Merging Jor-Mela Ramdas ~ Passing of Baba Budha Ji

06 Assu

September 22 GurGaddi Guru Angad Dev Ji 07 Assu September 27 Joti Jot Guru Nanak Dev Ji 12 Assu

October 2024 (Assu 16th - Katak 15th)

Katak starts 17th Oct.

Masya (new moon) - 2nd Oct.

Puranmaasi (full moon) - 17th Oct.

October 06-07 Historical Jorh Mela (retirement) Baba Budha Ji (Thatha) 21-22 Assu October 09 Birth Bhai Taru Singh Ji 24 Assu October 12 Celebration Darbar Khalsa (Dussehra) 27 Assu October 19 Prakash Siri Guru Ram Das Sahib Ji 03 Katak October 23 Birth Baba Budha Ji 07 Katak October 23 Passing Jassa Singh Ahluwalia 07 Katak October 25 GurGaddi Guru HarKrishan Sahib Ji 09 Katak October 25 Joti Jot Guru Har Rai Sahib Ji 09 Katak

November 2024 (Katak 16th - Maghar 15th)

Maghar starts 16th Nov.

Masya (new moon) - 1st Nov.

Puranmaasi (full moon) - 15th Nov.

November 01 Celebration Bandi Chhor (Divali) 16 Katak November 03 Gurgaddi Sri Guru Granth Sahib Ji (Nanded) 18 Katak November 03 Prakash Mata Sahib Dev (Mother of Khalsa) 18 Katak November 06 Joti Jot Sri Guru Gobind Singh Ji 21 Katak November 12 Birth Bhagat Nam Dev Ji 27 Katak November 15 Prakash Guru Nanak Dev Ji 30 Katak November 15 Shaheedi Baba Deep Singh Ji 30 Katak November 28 Merging Merging of Bhai Mardana Ji 13 Maghar November 30 Birth Sahibzada Baba Joravar Singh Ji

15 Maghar

December 2024 (Maghar 16th - Poh 17th)

Poh starts 15th Dec.

Masya (new moon) - 1st Dec.

Puranmaasi (full moon) - 15th Dec.

December 04 GurGaddi Guru Gobind Singh Sahib Ji 19 Maghar December 04 Shaheedi Baba Gurbaksh Singh Ji 19 Maghar December 06 Shaheedi Guru Tegh Bahadur Sahib Ji 21 Maghar December 14 Birth Sahibzada Baba Zorawar Singh Ji 29 Maghar December 20 Historical Leaving of Anandpur Sahib Fort 06 Poh December 21 Historical Splitting of Guru's Family at Sirsa 07 Poh December 21 Shaheedi Bhai Jivan Singh (Bhai Jaita Ji) 07 Poh December 22 Historical Saka Chamkaur Sahib Ji 08 Poh December 22 Shaheedi Sahibzada Baba Ajit Singh Ji 08 Poh December 22 Shaheedi Sahibzada Baba Jujhar Singh Ji 08 Poh December 23 Gurgaddi Panj Piarey Guru Khalsa at Chamkaur Sahib 09 Poh December 23 Shaheedi Piara Bhai Sangat Singh Ji 09 Poh December 27 Shaheedi Sahibzada Baba Jorawar Singh Ji 13 Poh December 27 Shaheedi Sahibzada Baba Fateh Singh Ji 13 Poh

January 2025 (Poh 18th - Maagh 18th)

Maagh starts 14th Jan.

Masya (new moon) - 30th Dec.

Puranmaasi (full moon) - 13th Jan.

January 06 Prakash Guru Gobind Singh Sahib Ji 23 Poh January 14 Celebration Foundation Stone of Sachkhand Sri Harimandir Sahib, Sri Amritsar (Golden Temple) 01 Maagh January 14 Jor Mela Sri Muktsar Sahib (Maaghi) 01 Maagh January 27 Birthday Baba Deep Singh Ji 14 Maagh

February 2025 (Maagh 19th - Phagun 17th)

Phagun starts 13th Feb.

Masya (new moon) - 29th Jan.

Puranmaasi (full moon) - 12th Feb.

February 02 Historical Marriage of Guru Gobind Singh/Mata Jito Ji (Guru Ka Lahore) 20 Maagh February 09 Historical Wadda Ghallughara (Kup Rohira - Sangrur) 27 Maagh February 10 Prakash Guru Har Rai Sahib Ji

28 Maagh

February 11 Birth Sahibzada Baba Ajit Singh Ji 29 Maagh February 12 Birth Bhagat Ravidas Ji 01 Phagun

# All dates are as per SGPC Calendar
